import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Navbar from '../components/Navbar'; import RoleDashboard from '../components/RoleDashboard'; const Home = () => { const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user') || '{}'); const isLoggedIn = !!localStorage.getItem('token'); return (
{/* Subtle Background Effects */}
{isLoggedIn ? ( ) : ( <> {/* Luxury Hero Section */}

Welcome to{' '} CivicAid

Your platform for reporting and tracking civic issues

Help make your community better by reporting problems and tracking their resolution.

Get Started Sign In
{/* Features Section */}

Report Issues

Easily report civic issues like road problems, water supply, electricity, and more. Your reports help improve your community.

Track Progress

Monitor the status of your complaints in real-time. Get updates on when issues are being addressed and resolved.

Community Support

Connect with volunteers and NGOs who can help resolve issues. Join the community effort to make your area better.

{/* How It Works Section */}

How It Works

Register

Create your account as a citizen, volunteer, or NGO

Report

3

4

Resolve

See issues resolved and community improved
